title: 川普发推说亚裔华裔对中国所做所为很愤怒！是否大外宣的钱白花了？
contents:
Asian Americans are VERY angry at what China has done to our Country, and the World.
Chinese Americans are the most angry of all. I don’t blame them!


https://twitter.com/realdonaldtrump/status/1260167707741368320?s=21


Then we must be very careful. Crazy Nancy would be a total disaster, and the USA will never be a Communist Country!

https://twitter.com/realDonaldTrump/status/1260152775389962240
